sentence.Network_en: All this renders me nothing but satisfaction and comfortableness.
sentence.Network_cn: 感谢上苍让我们考取同一所院校,给予了我们更多了解彼此的机会,赐予了我们如此神圣的爱情.

sentence.Network_en: Foamed butyronitrile coating, providing the best ventilation, comfortableness and flexibleness.
sentence.Network_cn: 发泡丁腈涂层, 提供最佳的透气性, 舒适、灵活.

sentence.Network_en: She longed for the comfortableness of her armchair.
sentence.Network_cn: 她渴望有一把舒适的带扶手的椅子.

list.abs: 舒适与安全舒适舒适(comfort) 是个体在其环境中保持一种平静安宁的精神状态，是身心健康、没有疼痛、没有焦虑的轻松自在感觉。 …
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Comfortable 舒适的 Comfort 安慰 Responsible 负责的.
人教版高中英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... comfort n. 安慰； 慰问 comfortable a. 舒服的；安逸的；舒服自在的 27 comma n. 逗号.
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Care 注意 Comfortable 舒适的 Comfort 安慰.

means.word_mean: 1. a state of being relaxed and feeling no pain;

sentences.sentence: "he is a man who enjoys his comfort"
"she longed for the comfortableness of her armchair"

means.word_mean: 2. a feeling of being at ease in a relationship
